How do I get involved with Verus?

You can get involved with Verus by discussing and exploring on Discord, following Verus on Twitter, and visiting their website. These public channels indicate that Verus is open to community engagement and discussion.

Defi at the protocol level is in operation on testnet. Interoperability and blockchain creation is joining on testnet shortly, with data exchange to follow shortly thereafter.
Once these protocols are in place to serve as public infrastructure, Verus expects rapid uptake for users and developers of all kinds to continue building and using the applications of the new era.
